name: web-app-ui-test-framework
description: UI Test Framework for Verifast Web Application

scripts.e2e-test: npx playwright install && npx playwright test
scripts.e2e-ui: npx playwright install && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.run-all-tests-chromium: PLAYWRIGHT_JUNIT_OUTPUT_NAME=playwright-report/results-chromium.xml npx playwright install && npx playwright test --project=chromium && trcli -y -h $TESTRAIL_HOST --project "$TESTRAIL_PROJECT_NAME" --username $TESTRAIL_USER --key $TESTRAIL_API_KEY parse_junit --title "Automated Tests from Local Run" --suite-id $TESTRAIL_SUITE_ID --run-description "Local run on $(date)" --file playwright-report/results-chromium.xml && npx playwright show-report
scripts.run-all-tests-firefox: PLAYWRIGHT_JUNIT_OUTPUT_NAME=playwright-report/results-firefox.xml npx playwright install && npx playwright test --project=firefox && trcli -y -h $TESTRAIL_HOST --project "$TESTRAIL_PROJECT_NAME" --username $TESTRAIL_USER --key $TESTRAIL_API_KEY parse_junit --title "Automated Tests from Local Run" --suite-id $TESTRAIL_SUITE_ID --run-description "Local run on $(date)" --file playwright-report/results-firefox.xml && npx playwright show-report
scripts.run-all-tests-webkit: PLAYWRIGHT_JUNIT_OUTPUT_NAME=playwright-report/results-webkit.xml npx playwright install && npx playwright test --project=webkit && trcli -y -h $TESTRAIL_HOST --project "$TESTRAIL_PROJECT_NAME" --username $TESTRAIL_USER --key $TESTRAIL_API_KEY parse_junit --title "Automated Tests from Local Run" --suite-id $TESTRAIL_SUITE_ID --run-description "Local run on $(date)" --file playwright-report/results-webkit.xml && npx playwright show-report
